channel.title: Problem with teleing in wild

item.title: Problem with teleing in wild
item.dc:creator: @AlecB AlecB
item.description:
@AlecB wrote:

->well i have the same problem with the other command ::minigame

–>and normal players can tele out so if can get one fixed i can keep it with all my tele commands.

—>bump

---------------//-k i messed around with it-//---------------

if (c.playerRights >= 3 && playerCommand.startsWith("staffzone")) { if (c.inWild()) c.getPA().movePlayer(2568, 4959, 0); c.sendMessage("Welcome to the Staff-Zone!"); c.sendMessage("[@dre@If you get a normal player here, you will be demoted!@bla@]"); return; }

but it wont let me tele there when im not in wildy but i have to be in wildy to tele to it. any way i can switch it around?
thanks

Read full topic

checked it out and it lets me tele outa wild using the command and i dont get a message about the wild level.[/quote]Wait… Why do you not want staff to tele out of wildy anyway? I don’t think their going to be PKing…

item.title: Problem with teleing in wild
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

if (c.playerRights >= 3 && playerCommand.startsWith("staffzone")) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2568, 4959, 0); c.sendMessage("Welcome to the Staff-Zone!"); c.sendMessage("[@dre@If you get a normal player here, you will be demoted!@bla@]"); return; } else if(Config.NO_TELEPORT_WILD_LEVEL == 20) { c.sendMessage("You can't teleport above level 20 wilderness!"); }Try this.

item.title: Problem with teleing in wild
item.dc:creator: @AlecB AlecB
item.description:
@AlecB wrote:

if(c.playerRights >= 3) { if (!c.inWild()) if (playerCommand.startsWith("staffzone")) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2568, 4959, 0); c.sendMessage("Welcome to the Staff-Zone!"); c.sendMessage("[@dre@If you get a normal player here, you will be demoted!@bla@]"); return; }

i would like it to say that you cant tele above 20 wild

itried adding the message in before and it said i had no errors but it wouldnt work ingame.
thanks in advance.

---------------//-k i messed around with it-//---------------

if (c.playerRights >= 3 && playerCommand.startsWith("staffzone")) { if (c.inWild()) c.getPA().movePlayer(2568, 4959, 0); c.sendMessage("Welcome to the Staff-Zone!"); c.sendMessage("[@dre@If you get a normal player here, you will be demoted!@bla@]"); return; }

but it wont let me tele there when im not in wildy but i have to be in wildy to tele to it. any way i can switch it around?
thanks

need some more help
